mapper.select: SELECT m.member_email, w.wishList_member_email, w.wishList_product_idx FROM member m JOIN wishList w ON m.member_email = w.wishList_member_email WHERE m.member_email = #{wishlist_member_email} AND w.wishList_product_idx= #{wishlist_product_idx}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wishList WHERE wishList_member_email=? AND wishList_product_idx
